column4: Hi....can anyone pl give me the link  to download samba .deb packages  ?
I think smb (server and client) is in repos
: I want to install samba on a mochine without an internet connection..
: what tp do in that case ?
sudo apt-get install -d samba , will download .deb and you can find them in apt cache.
You will need same version (number and arch) of ubuntu.
: where can I find it ?? pl tell me the path..
add proper -atime and you are home
: I am unable to get it
:I have downloaded the file from "sudo apt-get install -d samba" .Where is it saved ??
